jd: From: Uday Bhaskar, ITech US uday@itechus.net Reply to: uday@itechus.net Hello,Greetings from iTech US…We have an Immediate requirement, please find the below details… Role : Lead AWS Developer Location: Austin, TX or Dallas, TXOpen for C2C: Yes (Only H1B)Years of Experience: 10+ Years Job Details:Principal/Lead AWS Cloud Modernization EngineerMust have significant experience with at least one of the following:GolangPython.NET / C#Java Must Have Requirements:AWS - 5+ years solutioning and deploying applications in AWSLead Experience - 3+ years in a role demonstrating ability to own and drive deliverables with minimal technical guidanceAWS Lambda / Step Functions (serverless architectures)AWS ECS / Fargate (proficiency with containerized deployments, e.g. Docker)AWS RDS (relational and NoSQL database design/management, data management)Cloud security and recoveryAWS data streaming/messaging services (e.g. Kinesis, Data Firehose, SQS, or SNS)Terraform or CloudFormationExperience architecting for both Linux and Windows environments looking forward to hear from you…|| Email is the best way to reach me ||……………………………………………………………………………………..Thanks & RegardsUday Bhaskar | iTech US, Inc. |Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist Email: uday@itechus.net
